title: London/Hammersmith and Fulham
name: North End Road Market
address: Running the length of North End Rd, between Lille Rd and Fulham Rd
content: A London street market that's high on character and low on tourists, this has been running since the 1880s. A good place for fresh and affordable fruit and vegetables, household goods, and other items. | image=Fulham Broadway - geograph.org.uk - 313312.jpg
